Name: wd24HourClock
Label: 24 Hour Clock
Description: Returns True if you are using 24-hour time; returns False if you are using 12-hour time.

Name: wdCurrencyCode
Label: Currency Code
Description: Returns the currency symbol ($ in U.S. English).

Name: wdDateSeparator
Label: Date Separator
Description: Returns the date separator (/ in U.S. English).

Name: wdDecimalSeparator
Label: Decimal Separator
Description: Returns the decimal separator (. in U.S. English).

Name: wdInternationalAM
Label: International AM
Description: Returns the string used to indicate morning hours (for example, 10 A.M).

Name: wdInternationalPM
Label: International PM
Description: Returns the string used to indicate afternoon and evening hours (for example, 2 P.M).

Name: wdListSeparator
Label: List Separator
Description: Returns the list separator (, in U.S. English).

Name: wdProductLanguageID
Label: Product Language ID
Description: Returns the language version of Word.

Name: wdThousandsSeparator
Label: Thousands Separator
Description: Returns the thousands separator (, in U.S. English).

Name: wdTimeSeparator
Label: Time Separator
Description: Returns the time separator (: in U.S. English).
